ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.solver

Interface Solver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstantStepSolver, EmbErrSolver, PropertySolver, SdErrSolver, SymmetricVariableStepsizeSolver, VariableStepsizeSolver

    public interface Solver
    This interface defines a solver within ODEToJava.

    • Method Detail

      • get_ODE

        ODE get_ODE()
        Get the ODE this solver solves.
        Returns:
        The ODE being solved.

      • get_initial_stepsize

        org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 get_initial_stepsize()
        Retrieve the initial stepsize of this solver.

        For constant-stepsize solvers, this is the stepsize used for the entire solution.

        Returns:
        The stepsize (may be 0 if initial stepsize selection is being used).

      • set_initial_stepsize

        void set_initial_stepsize(org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 dt)
        Set the initial stepsize.

        For constant-stepsize solvers, this is the stepsize used for the entire solution.

        Parameters:
        dt -

      • get_final_stepsize

        org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 get_final_stepsize()
        Get the stepsize at the end of the solution.

        Only available after the solver has finished all integration steps.

        Returns:
        the final stepsize

      • get_initial_time

        org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 get_initial_time()
        Get the initial time for the IVP.
        Returns:
        The initial time for the IVP.

      • get_final_time

        org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 get_final_time()
        Get the final time for the IVP.
        Returns:
        The final time for the IVP.

      • get_final_values

        org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector get_final_values()
        Get the final values from solving this IVP.

        Only available after the solver has finished all integration steps.

        Returns:
        The final values.

      • get_initial_values

        org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector get_initial_values()
        Get the initial values for solving this IVP.
        Returns:
        The initial values.

      • solve_from

        java.lang.String solve_from(PropertySolver other,
                          org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 final_time)
        Begin solving from where another solver finished.
        Parameters:
        other - The other solver that was solving the same IVP.
        final_time - The final time to solve the IVP until.
        Returns:
        The reason that the solver stopped solving.

      • solve

        java.lang.String solve(ODE ode,
                     org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 initial_time,
                     org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 final_time,
                     org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector initial_values)
        Start solving the IVP until the final time.
        Parameters:
        ode - The ODE to solve.
        initial_time - The initial time for the IVP.
        final_time - The final time to solve the IVP until.
        initial_values - The initial values for the IVP.
        Returns:
        The reason that the solver stopped solving.
